actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the corporate surtax exemption from $50,000 to $100,000 and to provide for annual adjustments of such amount to reflect changes in the Consumer Price Index.

summary.text: Provides under the Internal Revenue Code for an increase in the amount of the corporate surtax exemption from $50,000 to $100,000. Provides for annual adjustments of such amount to reflect changes in the Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the corporate surtax exemption from $50,000 to $100,000 and to provide for annual adjustments of such amount to reflect changes in the Consumer Price Index.
